SELECT ar.review_id, ar.fan_id, ar.album_id, ar.rating, ar.comment, ar.reviewed_at, f.name AS fan_name, a.title AS album_title, b.name AS band_name FROM AlbumReview ar LEFT JOIN Fan f ON ar.fan_id = f.fan_id LEFT JOIN Album a ON ar.album_id = a.album_id LEFT JOIN Band b ON a.band_id = b.band_id WHERE ar.album_id = #{albumId} ORDER BY ar.reviewed_at DESC
